fullplot: To be titled "Big River Man", the film will follow Strel as he attempts to cover 3,375 miles in what is being billed as the world's longest swim. Strel, who hails from Slovenia, previously completed record swims in the Danube, Mississippi and Yangzte rivers and holds several Guiness World Records.
plot: Martin Strel attempts to cover 3,375 miles of the Amazon River, the longest continuous swim in history.
title: Big River Man

tomatoes.consensus: Big River Man offers uniquely absorbing insight into a larger-than-life eccentric.
